name: Sqoc
description:
This "Sqoc" game is an action-platform shooter. You are about to play the first tutorial level, which can give an idea of further development of the game. The minimalism of the graphics, as you may have noticed, is inspired by the game "Geometry Dash".

Here we play as a "square", which has only one goal - to Destroy Everything Round !!! But first he has to go through many obstacles.

This is our first experience in such a game and we welcome any feedback on various aspects of the game.
